full_summary:
# Tender Opportunity for Naval Distillate Fuel
---

**Solicitation Number:** WS3790093928  
**Tender Reference:** WS3790093928-Doc3812583757  
**_Date of Publication:** January 3, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2023, at 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)   (Please note: The amendment extends the closing time to 14:00:00 on January 9, 2023, and not the previously scheduled 11:00:00.)

## Tender Details
The government is soliciting bids to supply 350,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel, which will be delivered by truck to St. John’s Dockyard Limited (Newdock). The delivery is expected to take place in mid-January 2023.

## Tendering Process
This is a competitive open bidding procurement, adhering to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) provisions allowing for open tendering from suppliers. The selected bidder will be chosen based on the lowest price. Trade Agreements that apply to this solicitation include the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

## Eligibility andRequryements
Parties must be registered suppliers upon the Canada Revenue Agency's (CRA) Vendor Registration System (PRS) and have a Restrictions Notice that includes all terms of the commercial arrangement for the purposes of the CTA.

## Contact Information
Queries about the tender can be addressed to [Erin O'Neill](erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Quoted Sources
For more information, visit the Ariba Discovery posting response webpage: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15030330?extsite=MTUwMzAzMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
